statements: SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, date FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT employee_name, check_in_time FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31';
SELECT employee_id, check_out_time FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, date, check_in_time FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_attendance ORDER BY employee_name DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE check_in_time < '09:00:00' AND check_out_time > '17:00:00';
SELECT employee_name, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM employee_attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-05';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, email FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT * FROM attendance ORDER BY check_in DESC;
SELECT employee_id, check_in, check_out FROM attendance WHERE employee_id='c78e0a8c-1ef9-43e2-bdb6-4a150a080b08';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, email FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' AND employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT employee_name, department, check_in FROM employees JOIN attendance ON employees.employee_id = attendance.employee_id WHERE attendance.check_out IS NULL;
SELECT employee_name, department, check_in, check_out FROM employees JOIN attendance ON employees.employee_id = attendance.employee_id WHERE check_in >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees ORDER BY department ASC, employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name, first_name DESC;
SELECT department, COUNT(employee_id) AS employee_count FROM employees GROUP BY department;
SELECT employee_id, start_date FROM employees WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, work_date, hours_worked FROM work_hours WHERE hours_worked > 8 ORDER BY hours_worked DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, department, start_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM work_hours GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_hours_worked > 40;

SELECT employees.first_name, work_hours.work_date, work_hours.hours_worked FROM employees INNER JOIN work_hours ON employees.employee_id = work_hours.employee_id WHERE work_hours.work_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Employee ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, department FROM Employee WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_id, position FROM Employee WHERE position = 'Manager' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours_worked FROM WorkHours GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_hours_worked DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT name, position FROM Employee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT employee_id, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE clock_out IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(hours_worked) AS total_hours FROM WorkHours GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_hours DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department_id FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT department_name FROM Department WHERE department_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE check_in >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY check_in ASC;
SELECT employee_id, salary_amount FROM Salary WHERE payment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT e.employee_name, d.department_name FROM Employee e JOIN Department d ON e.department_id = d.department_id;
SELECT employee_name, SUM(work_hours) AS total_hours FROM Employee JOIN WorkHours ON Employee.employee_id = WorkHours.employee_id GROUP BY employee_name;
SELECT e.employee_name, s.salary_amount, s.payment_date FROM Employee e JOIN Salary s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id WHERE s.payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
